title: Senior Penetration Tester
description:
**About Us** 




  





 Integrity360 is one of Europe’s leading cyber security specialists operating from office locations spread out across Europe, providing a comprehensive range of professional, support and managed cyber security services for our 300+ clients. With four top-class Security Operation Centers, we offer a complete end-to-end security services covering our clients’ security from every angle. Our services include Managed Security, Cyber Security Testing, Incident Response, Security Integration, PCI Compliance and Cyber Risk & Assurance services.
 



  





 What sets Integrity360 apart is our excellent team of people that drive the business forward. The company was founded with a focus on technical expertise and that philosophy remains today. The skills and experience in our company are some of the greatest in the industry and clients remain with Integrity360 because they can rely on and trust us to go above and beyond to ensure their needs are met. Listed multiple times on Gartner Market Guides for Managed Security Services.
 



  





  





**Job Role / Responsibilities** 




  





 This is a full-time position with the Integrity360 office in Stockholm, Sweden. The position is responsible for performing all forms of complex technical activities (including the Internal / External Network, Applications, Cloud, Mobile, etc.). These assessments will occasionally be done at the client site, primarily in Sweden. Proficiency in communication is essential, both written and verbal, as well as the ability to convey complex technical information to key international clients.
 



  





**Primary Duties/Responsibilities include:** 



* Perform in-depth penetration tests across applications, infrastructure, cloud and mobile platforms.
* Execute zero-knowledge black-box, grey-box and white-box penetration tests of specific areas within the enterprise.
* Perform tests and assessments in the cloud, including but not limited to AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.
* Perform security reviews of servers, network devices, architecture and application designs.
* Act as an escalation point for team members regarding project-related issues.
* Deliver pre-sales support, including project scoping, estimations, and technical assistance via calls, meetings, and presentations with key clients.
* Enhance Integrity360's security offerings, refining methodologies, reporting standards, and educational materials.
* Represent Integrity360 at international events, forums or training events.
* Demonstrate the ability to be an industry expert.



  





**Required Skills / Experience** 



* 5+ or more years’ experience in penetration testing or red team operations, including testing critical functionality, banking systems and more.
* Manual penetration testing experience above and beyond running automated tools.
* Expertise in AWS, Azure, and cloud-native technologies, including VMs, containers, and infrastructure as code.
* Previous experience as a Subject Matter Expert, or similar role.
* Experience in testing ICS, SCADA, mainframes, containers, hardware appliances, etc.
* Excellent understanding of firewalls, proxies, iptables, AVs and EDR products, VPNs, IDS/IPS,and various networking concepts.
* Knowledge of wireless technologies, mainly RF, Cellular, NFC, and Bluetooth technology.
* Experience in testing OSX / iOS and Android devices.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills in front of key clients.
* Experience in developing custom security tools and scripts.
* Fluency in one or more programming or scripting languages: Java, Python, C/C++, C#, .NET, ASP, PHP, etc.



  





**Certifications/Qualifications** 




  




* One or more industry leading certification (OSCP, CRTE, CRTO, OSCE, OSWP, ARTE, CPTS, etc.)
* CHECK Team Leader or equivalent is a plus.
* Computer Sciences, IT or Cybersecurity related degree is a plus.



  





  





**Working at Integrity360** 




  





 At Integrity360 we aim to reflect what’s important through the benefits we offer. We survey our people regularly and encourage discussions around these tops so we can understand what really makes a difference. Our benefits priorities are physical, mental and financial wellbeing.
 



  





**Mental & Physical wellbeing benefits:** 



* Private healthcare provided by Attunda Hälsan
* Health insurance provided by Söderberg and Partners
* Onsite Gym (Kista office)
* SEK 5,000.00/month for Friskvårdbidrag, our allowance can be used for Gym memberships, to improve health and more!



  





**Financial wellbeing:** 




 We guarantee that every employee will have their pay reviewed at least once every year, if not more regularly. We aim to pay within the market range for all roles and keep pace with inflation on average.
 



 What we offer:
 


* Twice yearly salary reviews
* 6% Contributory Pension
* Income Protection
* Death-in-Service cover



  





**Other benefits include:** 



* 30 days’ annual leave and options to carry over 5 days to the next financial year
* Our L&D program, we work with various platforms including Cybrary, Udemy, Preply, Pluralsight, Swift and HTB ensuring our people are up to date with their industry knowledge. Offering opportunities to further upskill and gain industry leading certifications.

title: Senior Solution Consultant, Nordics
description:
As a Senior Solutions Consultant, you will operate at the forefront of digital commerce innovation, driving strategic initiatives to help our clients achieve their business objectives. You will play a pivotal role in leading project pre-studies (Discovery), pre-sales activities, and high-impact client consulting assignments. Your expertise will be crucial in gathering and documenting technical and business requirements, and in defining and developing sophisticated technical solutions that align with client business goals.
   

  

 This role has a strategic focus on the Nordic market and reports directly to the Head of Solution Consulting, Nordics.
   

  

**What You'll Do:**
* Lead and Mentor: Inspire and guide team members, setting a high standard through your actions and insights.
* Expertise Development: Cultivate broad expertise across highly specialised fields and multiple disciplines.
* Strategic Advisory: Serve as a principal advisor, offering professional concepts to resolve critical issues and drive new ideas.
* Discovery Leadership: Participate and lead Discoveries as a Solution Consultant or Discovery Lead, influencing cross-team and organisational initiatives.
* Client Solutions: Develop, structure, and present innovative solutions to clients, ensuring their needs are met with excellence.
* Communication Champion: Drive organisation-wide communication and lead group-wide activities to foster a collaborative environment.
* Goal Setting: Align meaningful goals with organisational strategy and support others in doing the same.
* Knowledge Sharing: Engage actively in knowledge sharing, host learning sessions, and contribute to architectural blueprint reviews.
* External Engagement: Create and share at least one externally visible activity per year, such as blog posts, webinars, or case studies.
* Product Expertise: Stay updated with solution reference documentation and share knowledge on systems you master.
* Presentation Excellence: Compose and deliver presentations effectively to diverse audiences.


**What We're Looking For:**
* Experience: 6+ years of experience in solution consulting in E-commerce or related fields.
* Product Competence: Proven expertise in at least two products from our offerings.
* Technical Knowledge: Understanding of development concepts to be able to talk the same language with the technical teams and explain technical concepts to a client.
* Presentation Skills: Ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and effectively to any audience.
* Problem-Solving: Strong skills in structuring and solving complex problems and presenting solutions to clients.
* Leadership: Demonstrated ability to lead, mentor, and foster continuous learning and improvement.
* Communication: Excellent communication skills to drive organisation-wide initiatives and group activities.
* Discovery Experience: Experience leading discovery processes and managing team dynamics.
* Team Collaboration: Ability to work across project teams to resolve issues and drive task completion.
* Public Engagement: Experience in creating externally visible content like blog posts, webinars, or case studies.


**Why Join Us?**
* Impactful Role: Take on a leadership role with significant influence across the organisation.
* Continuous Learning: Engage in ongoing learning and development opportunities.
* Collaborative Environment: Work with a supportive and dynamic team committed to excellence.
* Innovative Projects: Be at the forefront of driving innovation and new ideas within the industry.


 If you're ready to make a difference and lead our team to new heights, we'd love to hear from you. Apply now to join us as a Senior Solution Consultant and embark on a journey of growth and success.

title: Junior Quantitative Developer - Forecasting
description:
We are seeking a talented and passionate Junior Quantitative Developer to join our Forecasting Team. You will be part of a small but growing team of data scientists and analytics engineers that specialize in predicting the outlook of the Spotify business. This is a highly impactful role where you will be supporting the development and direction of the in-house user and content forecasting system, using large scale data from across the organization to deliver accurate impact estimates on a global scale for senior business partners
   

  

**Please include a cover letter with your resume/application submission.**
 What You'll Do
   

  

* Actively support and enhance the backend of our forecasting system, contributing to its robustness and scalability. This involves collaborating closely with data scientists and engineers on a quantitatively complex codebase to enhance system architecture and performance, as well as to integrate new features.
* You will support the development of a comprehensive web portal that facilitates access to our forecasting tools, ensuring our internal teams can make data-driven decisions with ease. Additionally, you will manage our cloud-based compute resources, focusing on performance and scalability to efficiently leverage cloud technologies for optimal data processing capabilities.


 Who You Are
   

  

* Educational Background: A degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field.
* Technical Proficiency: Strong proficiency in Python is essential. Experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) is highly desirable, as it is our primary cloud service provider. Additionally, prior experience with SQL is advantageous.
* Analytical Skills: Strong quantitative skills and familiarity with statistical concepts and numerical analysis are crucial due to the complexity of our systems.
* Experience: At least 2+ years of experience working with Python on a daily basis.
* Mindset: Possesses excellent communication skills and a collaborative spirit, coupled with a passion for innovative problem-solving and a drive to think outside the box in a team-driven environment


 Where You'll Be
   

  

* For this role, there will be some in-person meetings, but still allows for flexibility to work from home. We ask that you come into the Stockholm office 2-3 times per week.


 #JobSite-Featured
   

  

 #JobSite-Main-DataResearchAndInsights
   

  

 Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

title: Head Of Marketing, Trilogy (Remote) - $400,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. Have you got what it takes?
   

  

 The professional services industry is undergoing a rapid transformation, driven by the need for increased efficiency and innovation. Despite the proliferation of AI tools, many organizations still grapple with manual workflows, slow customer feedback loops, and the challenge of building a distinct market presence. Data shows that companies implementing AI-driven productivity improvements can see up to a 40% increase in efficiency, yet only a small fraction have successfully integrated these advancements into their operations.
   

  

 At Trilogy, we are reimagining the role of AI in professional services by focusing on generative AI to streamline processes and enhance customer engagement. This approach not only drives significant productivity gains but also ensures our solutions are at the forefront of technological innovation. Our commitment to leveraging the latest advancements in AI sets us apart and creates a dynamic, impactful work environment.
   

  

 This role is not your typical CEO track focused on developing pie-in-the-sky strategies or schmoozing investors. Instead, you will spearhead AI-driven productivity improvements, interact directly with customers to gather and implement feedback, and work towards automating an entire organization. This position is ideal for someone who thrives on using cutting-edge technology to drive business impact and excels in a fast-paced, customer-centric environment.
   

  

 As part of our team, you will have the unique opportunity to drive productivity and customer engagement across over 100 software products, all while bypassing the usual internal logistics of a traditional CEO role. If you are passionate about AI, eager to make a significant impact, and excited about building your brand, we encourage you to apply and join us on this transformative journey.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Implementing AI-driven Productivity Improvements: Utilizing generative AI tools to streamline and automate various workflows across the organization.
* Customer Engagement and Feedback: Interacting with customers to gather insights and feedback, and using this information to enhance product offerings.
* Develop a Personal Monopoly: Publishing podcast episodes and blog posts and building a social media following to evangelize your portfolio's AI-driven products.


**Head Of Marketing Key Responsibilities**
* Transform a large professional services organization through the innovative use of generative AI


**Basic Requirements**
* At least 8 years of work experience in a professional services organization
* Experience using generative AI tools to achieve quantifiable productivity improvements
* Currently based in North America, South America, or Europe


**About Trilogy**
 Hundreds of software businesses run on the Trilogy Business Platform. For three decades, Trilogy has been known for 3 things: Relentlessly seeking top talent, Innovating new technology, and incubating new businesses. Our technological innovation is spearheaded by a passion for simple customer-facing designs. Our incubation of new businesses ranges from entirely new moon-shot ideas to rearchitecting existing projects for today's modern cloud-based stack. Trilogy is a place where you can be surrounded with great people, be proud of doing great work, and grow your career by leaps and bounds.
   

  

 There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Working with Crossover**
 This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $200 USD/hour, which equates to $400,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.
   

  

**What to expect next:**
* You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
* Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.


**Important!** 
 If you do not receive an email from us:
   

  

* First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
* Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
* Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
* If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.
